name: Labours
description:
Labours is a story driven action adventure RPG that follows the story of Kaeus, a man following in the footsteps of his mentor Hercules, by completing tough challenges and slaying mythical creatures set by the god himself.

Controls

How to play

Battle through waves of undead Spartae in each chamber of the Underworld and fight to reach your inevitable destiny.
